## Years for each variable

```{r}
data(gss_all)
```

Age - Agee of respondent

```{r}
gss_which_years(gss_all, age)

```

Education - Highest year of school completed

```{r}
gss_which_years(gss_all, educ)
```

Income - Total family income

```{r}
gss_which_years(gss_all, income)
```
